name: bloglist
description: blog list application, that allows users to save information about interesting blogs they have stumbled across on the internet. For each listed blog we will save the author, title, url, and amount of upvotes from users of the application.

scripts.build:bloglist: rm -rf client/bloglist-build && cd ../bloglist-frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../bloglist-backend/client/bloglist-build
scripts.build:personal: rm -rf client/personalsite-build && cd ../../personal-site && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../bloglist/bloglist-backend/client/personalsite-build
scripts.heroku:deploy: cd .. && git add bloglist-backend && git commit --allow-empty -m "deploy" && git subtree push --prefix bloglist-backend heroku master

author: amkrosa
